statements: DELETE FROM charging_stations WHERE city = 'San Francisco' AND state = 'CA'
DELETE FROM charging_stations WHERE power_rating = 50 AND state = 'CA';
DELETE FROM charging_stations WHERE operator = 'ABC Chargers' AND city = 'Los Angeles';
DELETE FROM location WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM location WHERE city = 'New York' AND address = '123 Main Street';
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id = 1001 AND email = 'john.doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE end_time < '2022-01-01' AND amount_paid > 50;
